prompt:
Implement Sprint 2 for the Todo App project. Work inside the current directory (projects/todo-app/).

## Sprint Goal
The app is complete enough for daily use — edit, filter, search, and bulk actions all work.

## Stack
- Backend: Go + Gin + GORM + SQLite in backend/
- Frontend: React + TypeScript + Vite in frontend/
- Backend port: 8080, Frontend port: 3000

## Context
Sprint 1 is already complete. The app has: create, list, toggle complete, edit title (inline), delete, filter (All/Active/Completed), skeleton loader, toast errors, hover-delete button.

Read the existing frontend/src/App.tsx and related files before making changes so you understand the current state.

---

## US-06 — Edit a Todo Title (verify existing implementation)
Verify these acceptance criteria are already met; fix or add if missing:
- Double-click todo title enters inline edit mode (input replaces title text)
- Enter or blur saves new title via PUT /todos/:id
- Escape cancels edit and restores original title
- Empty title cancels edit silently
- Saved title persists across page reloads (fetched from DB)

---

## US-08 — Filter Todos by Status (verify existing implementation)
Verify these acceptance criteria are already met; fix or add if missing:
- Footer filter buttons: All | Active | Completed
- "Active" shows only incomplete todos
- "Completed" shows only completed todos
- "All" shows all todos
- Active filter button is visually highlighted (e.g. border, bold, or color change)

---

## US-09 — Search Todos (NEW)
Add a search input field to the UI:
- Typing in the search box filters the displayed todos case-insensitively by title
- Clearing the search box restores the full list (respecting the active status filter)
- When no todos match the search, show a "No results for ..." message
- Search is client-side (no new backend endpoint needed)
- Search and filter work together (search within the currently filtered set)

---

## US-10 — Bulk Actions (NEW)
Add bulk action controls to the footer:
- Show "X items left" count where X = number of active (incomplete) todos
- "Mark all complete" button:
  - If any todos are active: mark ALL todos completed (call PUT /todos/:id for each)
  - If ALL todos are already completed: mark ALL todos active (toggle behaviour)
- "Clear completed" button:
  - Delete all completed todos (call DELETE /todos/:id for each)
  - Only show this button when there is at least one completed todo
- Both buttons call the real backend API (no optimistic-only updates)
- Refresh the list after bulk operations complete

---

## API Contract (unchanged from Sprint 1)
- GET    /health      → 200 {"status":"ok"}
- GET    /todos       → 200 [{...}]
- POST   /todos       → 201 {...}
- PUT    /todos/:id   → 200 {...}  body: {"title":"string","completed":bool}
- DELETE /todos/:id   → 204

---

## Definition of Done
- go build ./... (from backend/) — no errors
- go vet ./... (from backend/) — no errors
- npm run build (from frontend/) — zero TypeScript errors
- No TypeScript any types
- No hardcoded URLs (VITE_API_URL)
- All 4 stories verified working

---

## Rules
1. Read existing source files before editing them
2. After every frontend change: run npm run build from frontend/ and fix ALL TypeScript errors before continuing
3. After any backend change: run go build ./... and go vet ./... from backend/
4. Do not break Sprint 1 features (create, list, toggle, delete, filter, toast, skeleton)
5. Implement in order: verify US-06, verify US-08, implement US-09, implement US-10

When ALL 4 stories are verified/implemented, both builds pass cleanly, output exactly:
COMPLETE
